flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Tools
  • Acrylic paint
  • Hot Glue gun & hot glue
  • Paper Plates
  • Paper bag
  • Scissors
  • Strips of fabric
  • White spray paint
  • box, cardboard
  • paint brushes for priming & painting

lines.text: Cut box top and bottom as seen here.
lines.text_raw: Cut box top and bottom as seen here.

lines.text: Hot-glue top flaps together.
lines.text_raw: Hot-glue top flaps together.

lines.text: Spray-paint box.
lines.text_raw: Spray-paint box.

lines.text: Allow 24 hours to dry.
lines.text_raw: Allow 24 hours to dry.

lines.text: Cut paper plates to appropriate size for box.
lines.text_raw: Cut paper plates to appropriate size for box.

lines.text: Paint wheels with black acrylic paint.
lines.text_raw: Paint wheels with black acrylic paint.

lines.text: Allow 1 hour to dry.
lines.text_raw: Allow 1 hour to dry.

lines.text: Creating Rosie's window and siding.
lines.text_raw: Creating Rosie's window and siding.

lines.text: The box should be dry now. Paint it the main color of the train that you're making.
lines.text_raw: The box should be dry now. Paint it the main color of the train that you're making.

lines.text: Paint the top of the box black.
lines.text_raw: Paint the top of the box black.

lines.text: This will be the coal box.
lines.text_raw: This will be the coal box.

lines.text: Start to shape the body of the character. The details shown here are made from white paper bags fastened with hot glue. You can just paint them on also.
lines.text_raw: Start to shape the body of the character. The details shown here are made from white paper bags fastened with hot glue. You can just paint them on also.

lines.text: Outline the windows.
lines.text_raw: Outline the windows.

lines.text: The ladder is made out of paper bag handles.
lines.text_raw: The ladder is made out of paper bag handles.

lines.text: Paint another paper bag black for the coal.
lines.text_raw: Paint another paper bag black for the coal.

lines.text: Don't forget the buffers. (Big deal for the kids.)
lines.text_raw: Don't forget the buffers. (Big deal for the kids.)

lines.text: Cut your coal up into strips and hot glue them on. Sorry no pic.
lines.text_raw: Cut your coal up into strips and hot glue them on. Sorry no pic.

lines.text: Hot glue some straps on.
lines.text_raw: Hot glue some straps on.

lines.text: Pin it on a kid.
lines.text_raw: Pin it on a kid.

lines.text: Add some face paint.
lines.text_raw: Add some face paint.

lines.text: Some spider web for Percy the Ghost Train.
lines.text_raw: Some spider web for Percy the Ghost Train.

lines.text: And presto! Go get some candy.
lines.text_raw: And presto! Go get some candy.

lines.text: Lesson learned: Never go trick-or-treating in the cold rain.
lines.text_raw: Lesson learned: Never go trick-or-treating in the cold rain.

guide.summary: Some ideas for kids' Halloween costumes.
guide.time_required: 15 hours; 3 or 4 days including drying time.
guide.title: Thomas the Train Costumes (Percy and Rosie)
